previousIssue.problem: When both text and image were provided, system would only use text OR image, not both
previousIssue.example: Question='What is this?' + QuestionImage='diagram.png' would only search by text, ignoring image
previousIssue.consequence: Failed to find questions that had both text and image content together

fixedBehavior.improvement: Now uses ALL provided fields for matching
fixedBehavior.example: Question='What is this?' + QuestionImage='diagram.png' searches for BOTH text AND image
fixedBehavior.benefit: Exact matching works for any combination of text/image content
